155.movie_plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

147.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

165.movie_plot: An ancient mummy is revived to destroy the invaders of the 3,000 year-old tomb of an Egyptian princess.

146.movie_plot: Remake of the 1958 sci-fi horror classic about a deadly blob from another planet which consumes everything in its path. Teenagers attempt without success to warn the townspeople, who refuse to take them seriously.

179.movie_name: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea (1961)
179.movie_plot: When the Earth is threatened by a burning Van Allen Radiation Belt, U.S. Navy Admiral Harriman Nelson plans to shoot a nuclear missile at the Belt, using his experimental atomic submarine, the Seaview.

172.movie_plot: Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race car driver to New York City in 2009, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.

178.movie_name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes (1972)
178.movie_plot: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

168.movie_plot: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

153.movie_plot: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

191.movie_plot: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

144.movie_plot: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a mummy that wreaks havoc on him, and his crew.

186.movie_name: Tales From the Crypt Presents: Demon Knight (1995)
186.movie_plot: A man on the run is hunted by a demon known as the Collector.

150.movie_plot: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

164.movie_plot: In order to get out of the snobby clique that is destroying her good-girl reputation, an intelligent teen teams up with a dark sociopath in a plot to kill the cool kids.

163.movie_plot: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.

152.movie_plot: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

160.movie_plot: An All-American trucker gets dragged into a centuries-old mystical battle in Chinatown.

167.movie_plot: A dedicated student at a medical college and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue when an odd new student arrives on campus.

148.movie_name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier (1989)
148.movie_plot: Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.

154.movie_plot: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

149.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

177.movie_name: Battle for the Planet of the Apes (1973)
177.movie_plot: One decade after a worldwide series of ape revolutions and a brutal nuclear war among humans, Caesar must protect survivors of both species from an insidious human cult and a militant ape faction alike.

185.movie_plot: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a mummy that wreaks havoc on him, and his crew.

190.movie_plot: When a boy comes to a new school and gets harassed by a bully, he acquires the services of the school's most feared kid as a bodyguard.

176.movie_plot: In a small American town, a diabolical circus and its demonic proprietor prey on the townsfolk.

156.movie_plot: An unfaithful wife encounters the zombie of her dead lover; the demonic cenobites are pursuing him after he escaped their sadomasochistic underworld.

184.movie_plot: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

151.movie_plot: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

174.movie_plot: A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.

180.movie_plot: Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.

187.movie_plot: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her home's new owners.

145.movie_plot: An archaeological expedition brings back to London the coffin of an Egyptian queen known for her magical powers. Her spirit returns in the form of a young girl and strange things start to happen.

173.movie_plot: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

157.movie_plot: A bureaucrat, in a retro-future world, tries to correct an administrative error, and becomes an enemy of the state.

170.movie_plot: After a bizarre and near fatal encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.

182.movie_plot: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the death of her family, where the occult-obsessive head resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites once again.

183.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

161.movie_plot: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina winter house after the funeral of one of their friends.

175.movie_plot: Cyborg law enforcer RoboCop returns to protect the citizens of old Detroit but faces a deadly challenge when a rogue OCP member secretly creates a new, evil RoboCop 2.

189.movie_plot: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business. The story is intertwined with various vignettes about the relationship of love and food.

188.movie_plot: After a tragic accident, a man conjures up a towering, vengeful demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy a group of unsuspecting teenagers.

159.movie_plot: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

166.movie_plot: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

132.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)

63.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

82.movie_plot: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

41.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

79.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)

53.movie_plot: In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

125.movie_plot: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

49.movie_plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

142.movie_plot: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

26.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

133.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

0.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

70.movie_plot: Tia and her brother Tony have supernatural powers, can communicate and move things with the power of their mind alone. They arrive on Earth for a visit in Los Angeles. When Tony uses his ...

85.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

77.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

62.movie_plot: Mike Nelson and his robot companions watch and give their comments about This Island Earth (1955).

101.movie_plot: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

1.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

135.movie_plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

84.movie_plot: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

88.movie_plot: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

68.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

130.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

37.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

74.movie_plot: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

121.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

31.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

98.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

71.movie_plot: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

100.movie_plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

93.movie_plot: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

19.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

5.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

137.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

80.movie_plot: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled on a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

51.movie_plot: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

128.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

27.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

13.movie_plot: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

127.movie_plot: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

8.movie_plot: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

95.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
95.movie_plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

42.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

60.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

134.movie_plot: A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his blood stream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter the bloodstream.

67.movie_plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

54.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

24.movie_plot: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

59.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

86.movie_plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

15.movie_name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)

126.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

17.movie_plot: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone who must continue her battle against the aliens. Along with a crew of space pirates, Ripley must also prevent the deadly aliens from reaching Earth.

116.movie_plot: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

57.movie_plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

109.movie_plot: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number one patient is an insecure mob boss.

107.movie_plot: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.
